title: Broken Arm
body:
gif is mine


Helping brush their hair after a shower with Harry and injured reader


A broken arm meant that you were to be stuck in a cast for the next six weeks. You and Harry had gone through the local park for a walk after a long day at work, when out of nowhere a dog who had run away from their owner had managed to trip you up. You had landed funnily on your arm and the shooting pain that had seared through your arm at the time had been enough to cause alarm for Harry, he had apparated with you to St Mungos. You had seen two nurses and a healer, who had suggested that given the severity of your break that you would probably benefit more from a muggle form of treatment instead of a potion that might not fix the proper damage. So that was why you were in a plaster cast and struggling to do anything for yourself. Harry had had to help you change out of your clothes and even help you into the shower, a plastic bag had been placed over your cast before he turned to exit the bathroom. Somehow, with a lot of difficulties you had managed to wash your hair. Harry was waiting for you when the water turned off, towel outstretched and waiting for you to step into. After he had helped you into your PJs, he followed you into your shared bedroom, sitting you on the stool in the corner of the room he stood behind you and began brushing your hair. You felt you’re heart swell at the care your boyfriend was giving you, he looks up and raises an eyebrow

“What is it sweetheart? Does your arm hurt? Has the pain relief worn off?” he asks hesitantly, you shake your head, noticing the tears that were streaming down your cheeks

“Then what is it Y/N?” he asks concern lacing his voice

“I- just thank you, Harry, for being here to help me” you say and he leans down, wrapping his arms around your shoulders and placing a kiss a top your head

“There isn’t anywhere else I would rather be sweetheart” he says and you nod, seeing the truth in his words, staring at you in the mirror.

title: Tickle Fight!
body:
gif is mine


Having a tickle fight until you’re breathless with Harry


You were lounging around on the lawn down by the black lake, head resting in your boyfriend’s lap whilst he played with your hair. It was a nice warm day out under the bright spring sun. Exams were in progress up in the castle but for the first time in a week the two of you had decided to take a break from studying and revision to just take a moment for yourselves. Being in different houses meant that the two of you struggled to spend time together but when you could spend the time together you were inseparable. Your almost asleep in Harry’s lap, the sun warm on your face when you feel Harry’s hand shift from your hair to your neck, his other hand moving from his side to come and tickle your other side. You squeal in shock, eyes opening at him before the laughter overtakes your body. Your wriggling about in his lap now and he’s chuckling at your actions before you begin to pant, breathlessly

“Stop it! Please, Harry” you say it once or twice before he finally stops and you sit up, before sitting yourself in his lap

“That wasn’t very friendly Harry” you say when you finally manage to regain your breath, pouting at your boyfriend

“Oh, I’m sorry Y/N” he says teasingly and you shove him back, however, his arms have already wrapped around your back and he puls you down on top of him. You giggle before you place a gentle kiss on his lips, he’s eagerly reciprocating your actions and the two of you quickly become lost in each other. That is until you hear the familiar sounds of his two best friends calling out

“Really Harry? There is no need for that mate” Ron says and you chuckle, climbing off of Harry and sitting up next to him.

“Yeah Harry, I can’t believe you” Hermione says teasingly and you chuckle at him, especially when you see the deep-seated blush on his cheeks at being caught by his friends.

“Oh leave him alone” you say reaching out for his hand and giving it a gentle squeeze before you say

“Besides, it’s my job to torture him so” you say wiggling your eyebrows at the others, Hermione chuckles at that and Ron looks away in embarrassment at the mere thought of it, you sneak a look at your boyfriend who is shaking his head and doing his best at trying to hide a smile.

title: First Experiences
body:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony Following their family traditions that they enjoy with Draco


A/N: This has mature themes hinted at so anyone under 18 may not want to read this particular fic.


Draco was the person you had least expected to find enjoying the traditions that you, a Muggle-born witch, someone who up until the end of the war, Draco had sworn he hated. But here he was, the first Christmas after the war had ended, on holiday from your seventh and final year of Hogwarts, celebrating this tradition with you and your family. You were a Hufflepuff at Hogwarts and though you had always been the same year as Draco, he had never shown an interest in you until you had both returned to school at the beginning of September. He had been incredibly shocked to know that you had survived the attacks on muggleborns that had been going on ever since Voldemort had taken over the Ministry. You had explained to him that you had managed to escape to relatives that lived in New Zealand, somewhere that went undetected by the Ministry of Magic. He had spent weeks, gathering the courage to actually confess his feelings to you but when he had you had been over the moon, the man you had fallen for somewhere between the end of the third year and the Yule ball in your fourth year, was finally yours. It had shocked you when he showed so much care and tenderness towards you, he was quite literally the sweetest man you had ever meet, it was like he worshipped the ground you walked on and hung on every word you said. When he had asked if he could spend the holidays with you and your family, you had immediately owled your family asking if it was alright for you to bring your boyfriend home. The owl had returned the following morning with a letter from your mother saying that he was welcome to stay any time he wanted.


So, now here you were watching Draco help your mother bake the Christmas pudding, from where you were sitting on the piano seat, playing Christmas songs, as your younger brother and sisters, sang along to the tunes you played. Your favourite holiday tradition was soon to happen and you were excited to see Draco’s reaction. Once the Christmas pudding was finished and everyone had changed into their Christmas outfits, even Draco had a Christmas outfit, you sat snuggled into Draco’s side as the two of you sat on the armchair, mugs full of eggnog in your hands.

“Alright, so since Draco doesn’t know what we do on Christmas Eve, I will explain the proceedings and then we can get on with the festivities” your father says before he begins to talk through what exactly happens. Each of you gets to open one present from under the Christmas tree, before your father reads the story of A Night Before Christmas and you all make your way up to bed, a tradition that your family had been practising since you were very little. As presents are handed around the room, Draco is shocked to receive not only one gift but two. You chuckle at the expression on his face before he says

“I thought it was only one gift tonight?”

“I guess some rules are made to be broken” your father says before he begins to open the gift he had received. You open your gift from you’re younger sister Annabel and you smile when you see the first edition copy of your favourite Shaksperian story, A Midsummer’s Night Dream. Presents continue to be unwrapped, and you watch in excitement as Draco opens the Christmas gifts he had been handed, knowing that one of them was only half of your Christmas present for the man you waited nervously to see if he liked it. He smiled warmly as he opened the present for him from your parents, it was a pair of cuff links, something that you had made sure to tell your parents he was in need of, especially now since he was trying to get rid off the things his father had given him that tied him to the Dark Lord and evil. When he opens your present he’s a little confused at the gift, and you wink at him before leaning down and whispering,

“The rest of your present you will get later”. You watch as he swallows harshly, his eyes darkening just a little at the suggestion.

“Alright, now that we’ve all opened our gifts, let’s all settle in for the story” your mother says, trying to take everyone’s attention off of you and your boyfriend.


After the story is read aloud, you, Draco and your siblings all make you’re way up to your bedrooms. You had managed to convince your parents to let Draco spend the holidays in your room, and since talking with your mum to let her know what you were wanting to give to your boyfriend as his Christmas gift she had somehow managed to find a way to let your father be ok with this too. Now that you were alone in your bedroom, with your boyfriend, Draco is standing there a little awkwardly, before he asks

“So uh, you promised the rest of my present?” you chuckle nervously as you make your way towards him.

summary:
Challenge by @jolyne-jiyuu 
No one call me, but when does it stop me?
Peter O'Toole - The Impossible dream 
To dream the...
body:
Challenge by @jolyne-jiyuu

No one call me, but when does it stop me?

  • Peter O'Toole - The Impossible dream

To dream the impossible dream,

To fight the unbeatable foe,

To bear with unbearable sorrow

To run where the brave dare not go;

To right the unrightable wrong.

To love, pure and chaste, from afar,

To try, when your arms are too weary,

To reach the unreachable star!

- This song remind Luna about her father, that is why “The Impossible dream” so important for her.

- Years later she sing this in music school and at her father funeral.

  • Matt Bomer - people like us (Ost “Doom Patrol”)

Hey, this is not a funeral

It’s a revolution, after all your tears have turned to rage

Just wait, everything will be okay

Even when you’re feeling like it’s going down in flames

  • Nina Simone - Feeling good

Stars when you shine you know how I feel

Scent of the pine you know how I feel

Oh freedom is mine

And I know how I feel

Luna does like to talk about her feelings, but Penny with her therapy doesn’t think like that. It’s never works, because Luna is great liar. Maybe it’s happened because the one, who need a therapy - Penny, specially after Beatrice’s problem.

Luna know, how she feels and how deal with this.

  • Nat Kong Cole - Smile

Smile, though your heart is aching,

Smile, even though it’s breaking

When there are clouds in the sky

You’ll get by

If you smile through your fear and sorrow,

Smile and maybe tomorrow

You’ll see the sun come shining through

For you

This song always was loved by uncle Oswald, Jacob’s father. Luna barely remember him, but she never can said something bad about him, girl even have the same patronus as his - black swan. This song also was chosen for frog choir audience.

I’m tagging: @andrea-hphm-sideblog, @duringlife and @zoeysandersofslytherin

This song always was loved by uncle Oswald, Jacob’s father. Luna barely remember him, but she never can said something bad about him, girl even have the same patronus as his - black swan. This song also was chosen for frog choir audience.

I’m tagging: @andrea-hphm-sideblog, @duringlife and @zoeysandersofslytherin

blog.title: Giratiempo
blog.description:
Año 2023. Un giratiempo trae personas del pasado hasta el presente. 
El Ministerio de Magia está desmemorizando a magos y muggles del pasado y recluyéndolos, a la espera de poder devolverles a sus épocas de origen.
La OSPP intenta localizar a los llegados de otras épocas antes de que lo haga el Ministerio, para darles una segunda oportunidad.

blog.title: A Collection of Daydreams
blog.description: Writer. Feminist. Asexual. Traveler. My goal in life is to somehow befriend a dragon.

body:
Romione: perfume

I think a lot about the fact that Ron gave Hermione perfume for Christmas in OOTP.

Like. More than I’m probably meant to.

It could just be a throwaway line, just added to show that “Ron may like Hermione but is terrible at showing it” or for humor (certainly the latter to some extent, given Hermione’s reaction - “it’s so…unusual”.

But I think it could mean so much more.

Like. Think about Ron, slowly becoming aware that his feelings for Hermione are different then they used to be, or how they are with Harry, or his siblings, or Luna or his new female teammates. And now it’s Christmas time, and Ron actually has some money saved up for gifts this year. But he wants to do something different for her.

This is their fifth Christmas they’ve known each other. And it would be so easy to get her another book. This is Hermione after all. But Ron thinks maybe, Hermione would like one gift for once that wasn’t all about learning. EVERYONE gets Hermione books. It’s all she gets. And even if she loves them, wouldnt it be special for once to receive somethings BESIDES books? To acknowledge that Hermione is more than just a bookworm, more than just the top witch in school?

Maybe Ron remembers how Hermione reacted last year about them forgetting she’s a girl, and wanted to give her something that proved otherwise. Or maybe he noticed last year during the Ball that she smelled different; that she was wearing perfume then. Or maybe she just started wearing some that year, something subtle Ron only notices when they are on patrol, away from all the other distracting voices and smells and colors. Or maybe it was as simple as asking another girl for advice, or assuming all girls like perfume, but doubtful. Ron is tactless in the moment, yes, and movie Ron may be kind of dumb, but Ron is capable of strategic and forward thinking.

And yeah, whatever he picked out clearly wasn’t perfect, but it seems really obvious to me that he put so much thought into this gift, to try and make it special, and I think that’s really sweet.

And it’s all conveyed in one line.

summary: A estrela de Harry Potter cresceu e tornou-se numa forte tendência de moda. Difícil foi escolher os seu melhores looks já que...
body:
A estrela de Harry Potter cresceu e tornou-se numa forte tendência de moda. Difícil foi escolher os seu melhores looks já que todos lhe ficam bem. Emma Watson é bonita jovem e deslumbra sempre na passadeira vermelha. Ontem festejou 29 anos. Estes são os seus melhores looks.

Durante os Globos de Ouro a atriz optou por um híbrido. Metade vestido, metade conjunto com a calças. Pela frente não é nada de especial, mas quando se vira magia acontece. Este conjunto da Dior é muito elegante.
Na exibição do último filme da saga Harry Potter a atriz estava maravilhosa. Com forte vestido de princesa em tule da Oscar de la Renta. Estava linda.
Este conjunto de macacão preto é também da autoria de Oscar de la Renta. Durante a apresentação do filme “A Bela e o Monstro”, Emma Watson conjugou bem a roupa com a ocasião
Este modelo assimétrico preto da Prabal Gurung foi utilizado no evento Met Gala em 2014. Com o tema Punk Chaos. Não podia ser melhor utilizado.
Também dos melhores vestidos da atriz este Ralph Lauren branco comprido conseguiu sobressair a sua beleza natural.
No evento Tribeca Film Festival com um vestido recto da Burberry e jóias da Monique Péan. Elegante e simplicista.
Nos Óscares de 2014 Emma Watson apostou num Vera Wang escuro. O cabelo e maquilhagem estavam muito bem.
Com um lindo vestido da Elie Saab para apresentação do filme “A Bela e o Monstro” em Shangai.
O estilo de Emma Watson A estrela de Harry Potter cresceu e tornou-se numa forte tendência de moda. Difícil foi escolher os seu melhores looks já que todos lhe ficam bem.
